subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to deliver improved justice and security, including safeguarding citizen security, in conflict-affected settings
subproject.description:
The MYDDRP aims at contributing to the implementation of CPA by creating an enabling environment to enhance security through the provision of technical and material support to national authorities charged with the design and implementing a comprehensive programme of DDR.  The DDR programme will focus on the reintegration of XCs and SNGs as the main target group and will link with other national recovery and priority programmes aimed at other vulnerable groups ie. returnees, IDPs and host communities to facilitate a community driven approach to reintegration.  Linkages to support a community-driven approach will be guided through coordination with reintegration fora comprising national and international actors. Efforts will include timing and sequencing based on pre-empting security threats and prioritizing trust fund project implementation, such as the MDTF and SRF, based on threat assessments. The total target group through MYDDRP direct programme support is:

Target Group	SAF	SPLA	Total Caseload
Target of XCs and SNGS	90,000	90,000	180,000
subproject.title: Multi Year DDR Project

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to deliver improved justice and security, including safeguarding citizen security, in conflict-affected settings
subproject.description:
The project contributes to the implementation of the CPA with the following objectives:-

1- Provide social and economic reintegration of WAAF including counclelling and refferal services of 674 WAAF in the Blue Nile state.
2- Consolidate lessons learned and best practices on WAAF reintegration.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: WAAF Reintegration in BNS

subproject.description: Reintegration of ex-combatants implemented accordance with the National DDR Strategic Plan, with support from UNMIS.
subproject.title: DDR South Sudan

subproject.description: Social reintegration support and CSAC pilot projects implemented in prioirtized areas of SKS BNS and CS to support community -base reintegration ,reconcilation and security initatives. The purpose of this project  is to ensure DDR programme's contribution  to sustainble livelihood, peace and secruity in the most affected by conflicts areas of Sudan .
subproject.title: Social Reintegration &CSAC

title: Multi Year Disarmament, Demob. and Reint. Programme
